item.title: Full-Stack Project: vg-stack (Part 1)
item.description: Motivation In the web development space, tools and best-practices change quite frequently. At one point in the not-so-distant past, a LAMP stack was the go-to approach for launching a web application. These days, PHP is the #8 most popular programming language (according to a company with the name “The Importance Of Being Earnest”), while Python and JavaScript rank above it. One of the reason for this change has to do with the growing trend towards microservice architectures.
